QuestData.Title: SI:7 Report: Lost in the Woods
QuestData.Description: <Rell coughs heavily before speaking.>$b$bPlease, $n. You need to hear what we've been through.$b$bThe whole damned Alliance needs to hear what we've been through. There may not be much time left.
QuestData.RewardText: ...and that's <cough> how we found...$b$b<Rell's speech devolves into heavy coughing. The corner of his mouth produces a trickle of blood.>
